Job.definition: to do odd or occasional pieces of work for hire 2

1.definition: to buy and sell (as stock) for profit

2.definition: to hire or let by the job or for a period of service

3.definition: to do or cause to be done by separate portions or lotsn

1 a.definition: a piece of worka small miscellaneous piece of work undertaken on order at a stated rate

sub_terms.b: the object or material on which work is being done

2 a.definition: a specific duty, role, or function [a description]
